## Hacknet.getStudyMult() method

Get the multiplier to study.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
<b>Returns:</b>

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

This function is only applicable for Hacknet Servers (the upgraded version of a Hacknet Node).
